sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_app_intake.AppIntakeRequestItemUtils</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>AppIntakeRequestItemUtils</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var AppIntakeRequestItemUtils = Class.create();
AppIntakeRequestItemUtils.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
	
	/**
	 * Returns the sys_id of one of the sn_pipeline_environment records of type "Development"
	 * @returns {string}
	 */
	getDefaultDevelopmentInstance: function() {
		var grEnv = new GlideRecord(AppIntakeConstants.table.SN_PIPELINE_ENVIRONMENT);
		grEnv.addQuery("instance_type", "dev");
		grEnv.setLimit(1);
		grEnv.query();
		if (grEnv.next()) {
			return grEnv.getUniqueValue();
		}
		
		return null;
	},
	

    type: 'AppIntakeRequestItemUtils'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-01-26 16:30:16</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>b325d865c7914110408bc8d6f2c260c0</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>9</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>AppIntakeRequestItemUtils</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Application Intake" source="sn_app_intake">3d3c2505c3e22010b83971e54440dd75</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Application Intake">3d3c2505c3e22010b83971e54440dd75</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_b325d865c7914110408bc8d6f2c260c0</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-01-26 17:29:16</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
